title: Fixed the issue with the generate_report_prompt function to accept the tone parameter

body:
This pull request addresses an issue with the generate_report_prompt function, where the tone parameter was not accepted, leading to a TypeError. The following changes have been made:

1. Function Update: Modified the generate_report_prompt function to accept the tone parameter. This involved updating the function signature and adding logic to handle the tone parameter if provided.
2. Code Refactoring: Updated the relevant function calls to include the tone parameter where necessary.
3. Documentation: Added comments and documentation to ensure the changes are clear and maintainable.
4. Testing: Ran tests to ensure that the changes do not break existing functionality and that the new parameter is handled correctly.

These changes should resolve the TypeError and allow the function to properly accept and utilize the tone parameter, improving the flexibility and functionality of the report generation process.
